ValidationRule.description: Rule to require 1 Terms option to be selected. The Standard Terms option is selected by default. Only 1 option can be selected. Added 1/10/17 to prevent submitting Quotes without terms and conditions.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( (IF(CMAS_Terms__c = FALSE, 0, 1) + IF(GSA_Terms__c = FALSE, 0,1) + IF( NCR_Terms__c = FALSE , 0, 1) + IF( Partner_Quote_Terms_Renewal__c= FALSE , 0, 1) + IF( Partner_Terms_New_Bus_w_out_Flow_Thru__c= FALSE , 0, 1) + IF(Corp_Terms_Under_10k__c = FALSE,0,1) + IF(Redsky_Direct_Renewal_Terms__c= FALSE,0,1) + IF(Redsky_Partners_w_out_Flow_Through__c= FALSE,0,1)+ IF(RedSky_Partners_With_Flow_Through__c= FALSE,0,1) + IF(Standard_Terms__c = FALSE,0,1) + IF(Tech_Data_Terms__c= FALSE,0,1) + IF( VITA_Terms__c= FALSE,0,1)+ IF(xM_Renewal_Terms__c = FALSE, 0,1)+ IF(Anvil_Renewal_Terms__c= FALSE, 0,1)+ IF(Legacy_Minute_Terms__c= FALSE, 0,1)+ IF(Redsky_Direct_New_Business__c= FALSE, 0,1)
<> 1),
NOT(ISBLANK( SBQQ__Opportunity2__c )),NOT(AutoRenewalQuote__c), $Profile.Id != '00e30000000m0kO', $User.LastName != 'CPQ' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the appropriate Terms & Conditions to be included with the Quote. You can only select one per quote.
